XVStateWindowX Template Class Reference

subclass of XVDrawWindowX that allows user to obtain state of window at a moment in time -> has access to all objects drawn in window, etc. More...

Detailed Description

template<class PIXEL> template class XVStateWindowX

subclass of XVDrawWindowX that allows user to obtain state of window at a moment in time -> has access to all objects drawn in window, etc.
